name: Hooligan Vasja: Halloween
description: During the day he is a regular hooligan, but this night he has to save his house. He is strong and agile and his slingshot is his weapon of choice. He is Batma.., ehem, Vasja!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1.5GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: onboard video with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
